content.raw:
~~It looks like this has content which is from pull request #258,~~ so we should merge that one first. But other than that caveat, this looks good to me.

Edit: Actually, I'm not quite sure where the `src/MessageInfo.cc` and other related changes originate and why the diff thinks they aren't in `ign-transport4` yet. Do we have a pull request to get those changes into `ign-transport4`? If not, we may want to retarget this PR to `default`.
content.html:
It looks like this has content which is from pull request #258, so we should merge that one first. But other than that caveat, this looks good to me.

Edit: Actually, I'm not quite sure where the src/MessageInfo.cc and other related changes originate and why the diff thinks they aren't in ign-transport4 yet. Do we have a pull request to get those changes into ign-transport4? If not, we may want to retarget this PR to default.
